Easy. Sukhoi T-50 / PAK-FA.

I was aiming for the Su-34, but that\'s close enough.

> ![1255527.jpg](http://cdn-www.airliners.net/aviation-photos/photos/7/2/5/1255527.jpg)
I would have used the Mk.2 fuselages. The Su-34 has a bit of a wider body, with considerable wing blending.
